Create an empty Data Package

Source: R/create_package.R
create_package.Rd

Initiates a list object describing a Data Package. This empty Data Package can then be extended with metadata and resources (see add_resource()).

create_package()

Value

List object describing a Data Package.

See also

Other create functions: create_schema()

Examples

# Create a Data Package
package <- create_package()
str(package)
#> List of 3
#>  $ resources     : list()
#>  $ resource_names: chr(0) 
#>  $ directory     : chr "."
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "datapackage" "list"
